dc_title_s: Map of the Short Creek and Wheeling Creek Basins showing availability of underground water
dc_description_s: Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the Short Creek and Wheeling Creek Basins and quality of underground water.|Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.|Scale bar lower right corner of map.|"Prepared by JAMES J. SCHMIDT, Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"
